name: Solitaire Time Warp
description:
Follow the cranky kitty through time by playing solitaire with a twist. A recent addition to the app store with brand new levels, unique challenges, and a fresh experience on an old classic. Solitaire Time Warp offers 100’s of new levels, with more on the way, in multiple worlds, each with its own unique feel. Your feckless feline travel companion will grow on you as he leads you through increasingly difficult levels. Start out in Ancient Egypt moving through tombs and pyramids to reach the portal only to be taken to the Lost City of Atlantis where you will spend time in the underwater world before finding the next portal. Keep playing to find out where you will be transported to next!

-Stay alert as you face obstacles like locks, bombs and card eaters.
-Hunt for special cards like wilds and plus five cards.
-Use your streak meter to earn stars and extra coins.
-Stumble on bonus games to earn free plays and extra coins.
-Earn daily and hourly bonuses.
-Different worlds to explore, each with its own art, music and style keeps the game fresh and engaging.
-Easy gameplay with challenging obstacles creates a highly addictive experience!
-More levels and brand new worlds coming soon.
-Play through Facebook for easy play.

Don’t wait! Download this free game today and help our pesky pussycat find his way back to now.


For questions or technical assistance email us at: support@stocompany.com
